synopsis.text:
The university life of Nanako Matsutaka takes an unexpected turn when she finds herself enrolled in an unusual course - Abnormal Physiology, a class that delves into the realms of sexual perversion. Led by the unconventional Professor Kenji Meshiya, the course pushes Nanako's boundaries, challenging her morals and sanity.

As a naive student with no prior sexual experience, Nanako struggles to keep up with her eccentric classmates. Among them are the composed Konogi, the self-proclaimed pervert Mizukoshi, the porn-loving Michikawa, and the inseparable duo, Taguchi and Makiko. Each with their unique quirks, they add to the chaos of Nanako's academic journey.

In a desperate bid to pass the course and maintain her sanity, Nanako navigates through a series of unconventional "assignments". Will she succeed in this peculiar academic challenge, or will she succumb to the influence of her unusual classmates and professor? Join Nanako in this bizarre, yet intriguing journey of self-discovery and academic survival.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
